Today in Donegal, we have solid surf at 8 ft @ 11s W with fresh 17 mph SSW winds. Magheroaty Beach and Mageroaty are good picks, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 6 ft @ 12s W and lighter winds at 10 mph SSW, making spots like Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand fun options. The day after, expect poor conditions with 9 ft @ 10s WSW and strong 29 mph S winds, likely making it blown out. Best: tomorrow.
